website_summaries.verdict: All the quality you'd expect from Wet N' Wild in 3 beautiful eyeshadow palettes.
pros: Available in 3 color schemes: Rose In The Air, Not A Basic Peach, and Comfort Zone
Pigmented colors apply smoothly and blend well
A balance of lighter daytime colors and darker evening ones
Includes helpful tutorials on the back packaging
cons: Lots of fallout in the pan, but little to none when applying on your eyelids

customer_reviews.title: Good Palette
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't quite match my eye as well as they could. But i did get a new palette with colors closer to my actual eye color. Decent colors, and they work well with both wigs.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron-Arienna

customer_reviews.title: Pigment Galore!
customer_reviews.text: Modern Renaissance Pallette but inexpensive. Love it! I find myself reaching for this palette almost everyday. There is a lot of kick up in the pan (like with ABH shadows), but I don't see any fallout on my face when applying to my eyelids. I wore this yesterday (ofc) and today decided to do the same look, but with the ABH MR Palette, and this Wet N' Wild palette has out performed the ABH palette by far. The WNW shadows lasted longer and were more vibrant in color, didn't crease as much or fade. Will definitely be buying back up of this palette.
customer_reviews.author: Dashing Diva

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Despite being wrapped tightly in bubble wrap and having a larger piece of bubble wrap in the box (as you can see from the photos), the use of such a large box for something so small ensured that it arrived completely shattered. Very disappointed as I'd heard such great things about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pickren

customer_reviews.title: Mattes are pretty good, shimmers are meh...
customer_reviews.text: My palette did arrive with a busted shadow- color 6 (crappy job of packing by Amazon), so I had fun cleaning that up. The blue shimmer color (color 5) is crap. There is very little color pay off, even using a finger or a dampened brush. Color 8 was pretty meh as well. The matte shades are nicely pigmented and easy to blend. There is a healthy amount of fallout. The bigger pans of transition shades is nice. It is an affordable palette, and would probably work well for someone new to make up to experiment with.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Star Reader

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, just two colors hasn't enough pigment
customer_reviews.text: Love this pallet so much, it was pretty cheap so I decided give it a shot and I love it, good pigment and colors, just the violet or light purple and the one that looks like white wasn't pigment at all, but the rest it's pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Ana Woods

customer_reviews.title: A good dupe for a much more expensive eye shadow palette!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this apparent ‘dupe’for the ABH Modern Renaissance eye shadow palette, because it wasn’t available locally, at the time. I have both palettes, and this Wet & Wild palette is a very affordable, and a fairly good quality version of the high end one. This arrived quickly, and without problem; I would highly recommend it to those who want similar colours contained in the more expensive palette!
customer_reviews.author: Tim/Sherrey

customer_reviews.title: Great little palette. Worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Colors are great, and lots of pigment, saw this originally watching YouTube and Tati approved and loved the formula of the makeup! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Hagenbuch

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love all the colors in this palette (Rosé in the air). I'm sure I'm not the only one who finds it hard to get makeup online without really seeing the colors or texture. I do not regret purchasing it. Well packed. I'm not going to lie, I was super scared getting it in a bad condition but it turned out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JMattern

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I like this for the price, but there are a few strange things. One is that the light lavender color shows up a light orangey brown on my lids, the light matte highlight color doesn't really show up at all, and cooler transition shade shows up warm on my lids.The dark pink/red is beautiful, the burnt orange color is beautiful, the shimmer shadows are pretty. For the price it's worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: K Blake

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use...
customer_reviews.text: The eyeshadow has poor quality. It’s hard to use and the consistency of it is just so so. If you want a good eyeshadow, you should pay more and try some expensive eyeshadow.
customer_reviews.author: Xin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty mattes
customer_reviews.text: The seller of these eyeshadows took great care to make sure these, eyeshadows that I ordered got to me intact. They were enclosed in plastic wrap and taped. I really appreciate that. Why? Because the outside envelope got trashed but nothing inside was damaged. The colors were exactly what I was expecting. I love Wet & Wild cosmetics. These met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Primazon

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is wet n wild?! It’s a really pretty palette. I am going to buy all the other colors. I got the Rose in the Air palette and the colors are great. I think they would complement any skin tone. I was very surprised this didn’t flake or crease throughout the day. It really lasted. Huge surprise on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect neutrals with some punch.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, high quality. Beauty guru recommended, and I approve too! I have to say I have many different pallets, but these colors are the ones I like best and I keep coming back to them for my everyday look.
customer_reviews.author: SCJC

customer_reviews.title: Not the best eyeshadow...
customer_reviews.text: I tried several styles with this palette, but I kept getting comments from people about looking like I was being physically abused... No matter what I try these colors always look blotchy and uneven, and it leaves dust on my cheekbones so I have to try and fix it. A few of the colors do look good and go on smooth, so this wasn’t a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful palette and super cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous palette. I use the darker colors for liner and lighter colors for shadow and contouring. Mixing colors, especially that metallic green/blue/brown makes it pop! I have the older palette (different packaging) and you never know when they discontinue your favorite colors so I bought a second to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Powdery shadows
customer_reviews.text: The old version of this palette is honestly so much better. The shadows in this palette are pretty chalky and powdery. Once you lay down your shadows and try to blend, even with a light hand the pigment blends away. It’s a decent palette for the price though, so you can’t go wrong since it isn’t a huge investment like some high end palettes.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth your money
customer_reviews.text: The matte shadows on this palette are incredible. They go on easy and stay on. They're good colors too. The shimmers are a different story. They also came out of the package easily however it was difficult to get a thick enough layer that they really showed on my lips. Not impossible but a little more time consuming then I would've liked. Overall it's a solid palette and I'd buy it again, for the mattes
customer_reviews.author: isabella macal

customer_reviews.title: Like NARS or MAC
customer_reviews.text: Pigmentations x 100! I’ve tried every eyeshadow on this planet. This is like MAC or NARS. Beautiful smoky colors with hints of gold and green. Fall out a tad on your face, but wet it and it’s like gel eyeliner. For less than $5?? Yes!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice small palette but dont expect too much
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something compact and light that I can bring anywhere. The quality though is not as good as I thought it would be. I know for the price I shouldn't be expecting it to be so pigmented, but still. The colors are nice - I like it. I just have to re apply in the middle of the day to make it last til evening. For somebody with a budget, this is a nice product to start. Just not for me right now.
customer_reviews.author: JLim

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Would I purchase this again? Maybe. But I don’t think I’ll need to anytime soon. The product seems to go a long way, good pigmentation. There is a lot of fallout on the pallet. So I guess. Wasn’t pressed good enough? But there isn’t any under eye fallout. I’m pretty happy with the colors and it seems useful for lots of different occasions. Overall good opinions on this
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Might as well splurge on a good brand instead of this cheap one
customer_reviews.text: Might as well splurge on a good brand instead of this cheap one. Colors do not stick, fallout everywhere, chalky.
customer_reviews.author: Janeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice makeup. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought these on clearance. I got multiple sets, so I'd have all the colors. It lasts all day, with a touch-up/redo at night if I'm going out. It was a good value for me. The only thing I didn't like, was the packaging. I had to cut through 3 layers of plastic to get to the product. Overall, I'm giving these makeup sets 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: d.storni

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Breaks during shipping :(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this palette as part of my S&S, but they made me order a minimum of 2. This would have been a great deal, but one of the palettes came with a broken shadow (see pic). I would have minded so much, bit it was the big transition shadow color. Since it came in two, I am not able to return just one! *sighs*
customer_reviews.author: Quynh C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little palette. The shadows are nice but some of the colors are pretty and nicely pigmented but get kinda muddy when blending😕 I'll keep playing with it, may even order another color palette. It's not bad at all, I just need to play with it some more!
customer_reviews.author: Makeup Momma

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shades!
customer_reviews.text: Of course the duochrome shade has my heart I can't help it! It's small, compact, and very lightweight! I love the way that it feels when I hold it and I love how shimmery the shades are and how creamy the mattes feel.
customer_reviews.author: samira johnson

customer_reviews.title: Highly pigmented; Arrived partly broken
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about the quality because of the price, but I was very pleasantly surprised by how highly pigmented this palette is!! For the most part, they looked and blended just fine on my skin. I don't use primer for my eyeshadow either. For those wondering, even though there are some matte colors, it's a pretty shimmery palette. The packaging, however, was disappointing. Came in a bubble mailer with no further protection to the product. Somehow, only one of the colors shattered in transit. Just thankful it was one that I didn't plan on using.
customer_reviews.author: the triplets

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blending
customer_reviews.text: The colors are more earthy which is exactly what I wanted! They blend well with one another. Most of the colors have a slight shimmer. The dark turquoise color is very interesting, at least in the batch I got. With mine, when it's applied to the skin it is turquoise in some lighting while in most normal daylight it appears to be more of a dark brown with a hint of turquoise. This could just be my batch or my eye shape or something. But I still like how the color looks so it works out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice palette
customer_reviews.text: I'm always weary about getting makeup from Amazon but this is very nice palette. The colors work for some versatile looks. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: cheyjordan

customer_reviews.title: Powdery to the MAX
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what I was expecting. The shades themselves are great and this is a nice, neutral, cohesive (except for the blue) palette. I'm a big fan of Wet N Wild, love their Photofocus Foundation, highlighters, the liquid lipsticks, setting sprays... I'm always out to look bangin on a budget. These shadows, however, are a hard pass. They are so powdery, have WAY too much kickback and fallout. Be prepared for the sandstorm you kick up when you go to dip your brush in.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz Pariece Barry

customer_reviews.title: Nice pallet of colors though not highly pigmented
customer_reviews.text: I like this eyeshadow pallet but it’s not highly pigmented. It’s buildable though, but I wish the colors would be great on their own. Plus a little too much frost/shimmer in a couple of the colors. Great value though.
customer_reviews.author: Sher Bear

customer_reviews.title: Mexican skin, color shows well
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. With eyeshadow primer, the colors show up well on me. I'm Mexican so that's a big deal for a pallet so inexpensive. I haven't tried it without eyeshadow primer so I can't speak on that. Looking forward to purchasing in other colors
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive palette on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Made a few different looks! Smokey or Sheer! Love the pigment on some of the colors but the only downside is that one or two of the colors (specifically, the red metallic and the blue shadow) in the pan takes a few try’s to make it work on the eye with a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Marydivya

customer_reviews.title: Cute shades but didn't last that long
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute nice little product with nice shades.all the shades are pretty nice except the blue one. Didn't last that long as I expected them to be but over all such a nice product in this cheap price. Also packaging was a little damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Duaa Aslam

customer_reviews.title: Highly impressed!
customer_reviews.text: What an excellently curated palette! Such beautiful everyday colors. I’m highly impressed with wnw lately. This is up to par with my high end smash box cover shot palettes at a fraction of the price 😆
customer_reviews.author: MouthyMama

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly for the black shade. It has been the best cheap black shade I've used thus far. It doesn't fall out all over your face when applying and blends well. For the price, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Camarena

customer_reviews.title: What a pretty pallet of colors
customer_reviews.text: I have been using certain Wet & Wild cosmetics for many years. I started using W&W because my skin can tolerate it. Other, more expensive makeup, make my face get blotchy and cause breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: NikiB

customer_reviews.title: So versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen such a tiny pallete being so versatile before! I can create so many looks with these.. The only shade I dont like is the green one. I mean it's good but doesnt go well with my indian skin tone. But all other colors - just wow! It's a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Aparajita

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought these and she hated the fact that it came broken. She likes how they blend easy. Great option if your on a budget trying to make a gift basket. The replacement is shipping soon.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING color payoff & price!
customer_reviews.text: This outperforms a lot of my more expensive eye shadows! The color payoff is immediate & they blend beautifully. Would absolutely buy again & recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gwenith A.

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed in this pallet.
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed in this pallet! First of all the packaging been awful as it’s totally scratched out and doesn’t look like a fresh product. I guess it’s been sitting in the warehouse for a very long time. But what’s more disappointing is the shades are not pigmented at all. I swatched them on my hand and except for golden, rust and brown none other shows on my skin. I mean all those glitter shades are a waste. I bought it reading good reviews but I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: K.Sam

customer_reviews.title: Pigmented, blendable and great variety of colors
customer_reviews.text: These eyeshadows are amazing (I was going to say amazing for the price but they are just amazing). I'ma medium skin tone and this show up well and blend well. Plus you get 10 shades and there is so much you can do with them! I have 3 and want all of them now!
customer_reviews.author: Neha Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pigmentation and Amazing $Price$!!!!! 🎨
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely happy with this eyeshadow pallet!!!😍 Love the colors, love the pigment, and they blend Great!!! Definitely worth the money, and they are Super budget friendly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it hands down!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, it’s seriously so pretty and I got so many compliments on my eyes at my company Christmas party. The colors pop for women of color! It also shows you a great combo on the back for newbies, the makeup came on time but it was like a week wait. All in all it’s a great pallet and I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: NexGen620

customer_reviews.title: arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: items weren't damaged and came bubble wrapped. good deal for the price too
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Highly pigmented!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised but how pigmented these shades are! They're absolutely beautiful colors & that is a amazing price as well. I would definitely recommend this to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Renee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as good as the original formula but I do appreciate the mattes they added to this palette.
customer_reviews.author: Tamilton

customer_reviews.title: Broken palette
customer_reviews.text: These colors are great but in general it is so fragile and does not hold up well. I have used this palette about 2 weeks (daily use) and already can see the bottom from either use OR it has just worn away and broke. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I suppose you get what you pay for. I purchased this after a YouTuber stated it was worth the $$. There’s a lot of fall out, and I would say the pigmentations are decent. Feel somewhat drying. They’re ok.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect... long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. I choose this over all others pallets. Last forever. I work 10 hour shifts stays until I go to bed at night.
customer_reviews.author: April Powell

customer_reviews.title: Every day and travel
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard for eyeshadow. I like to use it for my travel makeup. It's pretty and lasts a while but the best part is it's cheap. If it gets lost, stolen, damaged or whatever. It's easy to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Hyon Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great make-up! Stays on great colors, cheap pdices!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best eye shadow also under 3$! Cannot beat it!! Love it 100% will be buyi g mode for my daughters also. Thanks amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Samantha Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Good pigmentation, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color selection. Good color pigmentation. I use a primer underneath and the color lasts all day. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Jayk J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this palette 💜
customer_reviews.text: Wet n wild eyeshadows are some of the best eyeshadows and this palette is no exception! They are very creamy smooth, blendable and long lasting. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T

customer_reviews.title: Nice shadow
customer_reviews.text: Colors are very nice and true to the picture. The shadow goes on smoothly and seems to stay on well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4Me

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Palette!
customer_reviews.text: A makeup artist used this palette on my sister for her Prom, and I had to have this palette for myself. The colors are gorgeous and last all day!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia K

customer_reviews.title: The 10 makeup get was worth it.
customer_reviews.text: They so many color to choose from. I really like wet n wild makeup. Only don't like it didn't have brush inside
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great color palette
customer_reviews.text: Great color palette. Great price, I use this for my around the house make up because it's so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors hard to open
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors. Application was easy but the case itself is a little hard to open. Had to use twisser to open.
customer_reviews.author: PRISCILLA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This really is value for money price wise, especially for some one like me who has millions of lip colors but rarely wears eyeshadow.
customer_reviews.author: Bvndrea

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice colors! These are items for a gift bag so I don't know how well they work since I wont be using them myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Bartie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed new eye makeup. I love the color variations available in this kit. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Holt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value eyeshadow pallet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeshadow pallet! I have all the big name “Nude” pallets and love this one just as much!! It is more compact for travel and very comparable in colors to #1. Very pigmented and lasts all day. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Best eyeshadow recently bought
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, very pigmented for a really good price. Small size to fit perfect in my purse. I bought two of them!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great colors!
customer_reviews.text: My second time purchasing and its great. The colors are true. Why pay more for eye shadow when these work perfect?
customer_reviews.author: Erica L.

customer_reviews.title: Not very good, but useable
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it fits. The normal colored eyeshadow is ok for pigment but gets everywhere. The glitter eyeshadow doesn't get on my brushes easy, the pigment is bad, the glitter gets all over my face, and they all kinda look the same once applied. Finally, it is hard as buggers trying to open it.
customer_reviews.author: aspyn

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought for my sister and loved it so much I kept it. Good colors. Does not crease
customer_reviews.author: Kassia C

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: These eyeshadow colors are very pretty. extremely affordable and comparable to other expensive eyeshadow palettes
customer_reviews.author: kellygirl925

customer_reviews.title: Good selection! New make-up needed after 2-3 decades!
customer_reviews.text: Good colors! Pretty much a general eye shadow selection. Nothing stands out about it! Daughter daughter-in-law was overwhelmed by my 25-35 year collection of make-up. Insisted I needed new! Ok did!
customer_reviews.author: charley erdman

customer_reviews.title: Great product... especially for the $
customer_reviews.text: Colors are neutral which is what I wanted. They look nice and are long lasting (I use a primer which probably helps). Though it's small enough to take with you if you are unsure. I've only had it for about a week and have only used it twice... not much point in putting on makeup during a pandemic!
customer_reviews.author: biscuitous

customer_reviews.title: Shades didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Greet value but there were too many dark colors for me. Looked different when arrived
customer_reviews.author: St

customer_reviews.title: Nice pigmentation
customer_reviews.text: Good pigmentation on all shades. Contains matte and shimmer shades. I bought this for a nice orange shade to wear on Halloween, and I've continued to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Decent Palette, Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: This palette is not too bad, the light taupe color transition and the cream highlighter color are probably my favorite. Some of the shades aren't as strong as the others, but still, not a bad palette for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TheJohnsonFamily

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pallet for beginners. Colors are nice. This doesn’t come with any brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Almis

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes this palette, it has nice colors, its well pigmented and its travel size.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Medrano

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Cute little palette with a lot of pigment. Blends well and layers nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Young

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Great for a cheap gift for children or adults that want to toss on and go out some , wears easy
customer_reviews.author: JustSoYouKnow

customer_reviews.title: gOOD COLOURS BUT WHY IS THE ROSE SO DRY
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE TO LITERALLY BREAK UP THE FORMULA INTO DUST AND SCOOP IT UP TO MAKE IT USABLE otherwise gr8
customer_reviews.author: ELLIOTT

customer_reviews.title: Hello, blue?
customer_reviews.text: Earthy, pigmented (w/ primer), and shimmery. Deducted 1 star because that blue is more of a purple-y brick color with blue shimmer. I've uploaded some swatches in natural and indoor lighting for the Comfort Zone palette.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Dusty and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pigmented so therefore has a lot of fall out. VERY DUSTY! But if you don't mind that, the colors are really pretty and for the price maybe a little fall out isn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: nehub

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative to Anastasia’s caramel eyeshadow, there was a shadow in here that was almost an exact match, for the price it is great eyeshadow, very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great Palette!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised with this eyeshadow palette! It is very pigmented and last all day. Way better than the Milani palette, which was more expensive. Will definitely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Tyria A.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice colors
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeshadow palette..i like the colors, they very pigmented and blend nicely and not a lot of fallout..i got the not a basic peach palette this is a must have and the price is just right!! I recommend
customer_reviews.author: StarPurple30

customer_reviews.title: Happy with products
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for more mattes but can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: mande

customer_reviews.title: What you need.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. It is a great product that I recommend, especially for those looking for make up, I mean good make up at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mwa Cirhalwirwa

customer_reviews.title: Blend easy and zero fallout
customer_reviews.text: Since the shades are richly concentrated, they won't fade, and I don't have to waste product trying to build coverage. The shades blend easily and the formula doesn't smudge after application. There's also zero fallout or dust, so you won't end up with raccoon eyes. I highly recommend this palette!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Gonzalez Granados

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It’s pretty good for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color story
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette. Very pretty color story that can be worn in so many beautiful ways. Def recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s good, I like most of the colors but it’s not exciting or spicial in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Dawn Cassels

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived already opened.. dirty and a gnarly blonde strand of hair stuck to a label in the back.
customer_reviews.author: KellyAnn

customer_reviews.title: it was amazing
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. i recommend you to buy it. it was shiny.
customer_reviews.author: rosy

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Great Palette
customer_reviews.text: As an add-on this was a wonderful surprise. Nice color pay off and cannot beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Value Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic palette. On top of that the price is unbelievable. It is easy to create a variety of looks with this palette. I also appreciate the size of the two transition shade's pans.
customer_reviews.author: alyxsheerheart

customer_reviews.title: Will reorder
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels just like it’s dupe. Love the pigment this product delivers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happily Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Very pigmented, great coverage. very happy with these, going to purchase in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Kornexl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: It has beautiful colors but it doesn't include any brush. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Dp

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: It's fine. There is a lot of pigment when you first apply, only to try to blend it out and it kinda... goes away. I love the color scheme though, it's all in the same kind of range, and not colors that wouldn't work together, or are too bold. The size is nice, and they give you a good amount of product for the price. The color is a bit light then i had expected, but I really don't mind. This product does not cause any irritation to my combination skin. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Buffay!

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Only the gold and blue color gives the shimmering look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Shocked at how nice this is...I use pretty much all high end pallets but this one caught my attention and it did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: S. reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great palette!
customer_reviews.text: Great color payoff and blend-ability, I really like the color combination in this palette too! Seriously a bargain for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Napierski

customer_reviews.title: It’s my travel pallet. More portable and less costly ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s my travel pallet. More portable and less costly than the peach pallet.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Getz

product_meta.title: wet n wild Color Icon Eyeshadow 10 Pan Palette, Rose in the Air
product_meta.description: Color:Rose in the AirPowerfully pigmented, buttery soft, glides on like a dream. Thats what we dreamed up with our reformulated Color Icon eyeshadows. Our reformulated Color Icon hues come in a mix of coveted colors, from shimmery daytime hues to sultry shades for cocktail hoursincluding new matte transitional shades for impeccable blending. Net Wt. 0.35 oz / 10 g
feature_bullets: THE EYES HAVE IT: Bold, neutral, stand out or blend in—it is your choice! The wet n wild Color Icon Eyeshadow Palette with 10 pigment-rich shades, lets you create subtle, shimmering, or sultry looks.
ICONIC LOOKS: This versatile eyeshadow palette features a mix of coveted colors, from shimmery daytime hues to sultry shades for cocktail—including matte transitional shades for impeccable blending.
BEST FACE FORWARD: From bronzer & blush to primer, highlighter, natural finish powder, & concealer, we've got you covered & photo ready for your next big thing. You've met your true makeup match!
ALWAYS CRUELTY FREE: wet n wild is 100% cruelty free, & always has been! We also carry vegan makeup & tools such as foundation, nail polish, contour palettes, lipstick, makeup brushes & more.

STAY WILD: wet n wild is the trusted beauty destination for beauty lovers of all ages, ethnicities, skin colors, & economic statuses. No matter who or where you are in life, we have a product for you!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
